color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">脚本之前，需要你了解很多关于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">shell</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:

color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的知识，这些知识是编写</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">shell</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:

minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;
color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">脚本的基础，所以希望你能够熟练的掌握</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">日常的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;
mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">系统管理工作中必不可少的就是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">shell</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">脚本，如果不会写</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">shell</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">脚本，那么你就不算一个合格的管理员。目前很多单位在招聘</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">系统管理员时，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">shell</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">脚本的编写是必考的项目。有的单位甚至用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">shell</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">脚本的编写能力来衡量这个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">系统管理员的经验是否丰富。笔者讲这些的目的只有一个，那就是让你认真对待</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">shell</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">脚本，从一开始就要把基础知识掌握牢固，然后要不断的练习，只要你</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">shell</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">脚本写的好，相信你的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">求职路就会轻松的多。笔者在这一章中并不会多么详细的介绍</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">shell</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">脚本，而只是带你进入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">shell</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">脚本的世界，如果你很感兴趣那么请到网上下载相关的资料或者到书店购买相关书籍吧。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;

font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">shell </span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">简单点理解，就是系统跟计算机硬件交互时使用的中间介质，它只是系统的一个工具。实际上，在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">shell</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">和计算机硬件之间还有一层东西那就是系统内核了。打个比方，如果把计算机硬件比作一个人的躯体，而系统内核则是人的大脑，至于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">shell</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，把它比作人的五官似乎更加贴切些。回到计算机上来，用户直接面对的不是计算机硬件而是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">shell</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，用户把指令告诉</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">shell</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，然后</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">shell</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">再传输给系统内核，接着内核再去支配计算机硬件去执行各种操作。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;

14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:

宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;

Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;

mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;

font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">shell</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">我们敲过的命令，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:

宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;
mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">是会有记录的，预设可以记录</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:

mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">条历史命令。这些命令保存在用户的家目录中的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">.bash_history</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:

mso-font-kerning:0pt">文件中。有一点需要你知道的是，只有当用户正常退出当前</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">shell</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;
mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">时，在当前</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">shell</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">与命令历史有关的有一个有意思的字符那就是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">”!”</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;
mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">了。常用的有这么几个应用：（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">1</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">!! </span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">（连续两个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:

Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">），表示执行上一条指令；（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:

Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">!n</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">（这里的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:

Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">是数字），表示执行命令历史中第</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">n</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">条指令，例如</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">”!100”</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">表示执行命令历史中第</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">100</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">个命令；（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">3</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">!</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;mso-font-kerning:0pt">字符串（字符串大于等于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-fareast-font-family:
